name: Pasta Carbonara
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste

instructions.en: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package instructions
instructions.sk: Priveďte veľký hrniec slanej vody do varu a uvarte špagety podľa pokynov na obale
instructions.ja: 大きな鍋に塩水を沸かし、パッケージの指示に従ってスパゲッティを茹でる

instructions.en: In a frying pan, cook pancetta with olive oil until crispy
instructions.sk: Na panvici opečte pancettu na olivovom oleji do chrumkava
instructions.ja: フライパンでパンチェッタをオリーブオイルでカリカリに炒める

instructions.en: In a mixing bowl, whisk together eggs, grated cheeses, salt, and pepper
instructions.sk: V miske vyšľahajte vajcia, nastrúhané syry, soľ a čierne korenie
instructions.ja: ボウルに卵、すりおろしたチーズ、塩、こしょうを入れて混ぜる

instructions.en: Drain pasta, reserving 1/2 cup of pasta water. Add pasta to the pan with pancetta
instructions.sk: Sceďte cestoviny, pričom si odložte 1/2 šálky vody z cestovín. Pridajte cestoviny do panvice s pancettou
instructions.ja: パスタの茹で汁1/2カップを取り分けてから湯切りし、パンチェッタの入ったフライパンに加える

instructions.en: Remove pan from heat, add egg mixture, tossing quickly to coat pasta without scrambling eggs
instructions.sk: Odstavte panvicu z ohňa, pridajte vaječnú zmes a rýchlo premiešajte, aby sa cestoviny obalili bez toho, aby sa vajcia zrazili
instructions.ja: フライパンを火から外し、卵液を加えて素早く絡める（卵が固まらないように注意）
